price: Jahannamiin siifi isaan irraa namoota si hordofan hundaaniin guuta.”
arabic: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
